name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Later: Save webpages to a list

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple list to save any pages for later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you ever find yourself with too many tabs open and too many tasks on your plate? With Later, you can easily save all of your next-to-do items in one place and focus on your current task without context switching. 

Later allows you to:

With Later, you can focus on what you're doing without getting sidetracked. Prioritize your tasks and tackle them when you're ready. 

Say goodbye to cluttered tabs and hello to a more organized and focused workflow. Try Later today!
